medical_history.chief_complaint: Diffuse intermittent infraumbilical abdominal pain with nausea and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain began since an unspecified date, initially following meals but occurring without association to meals in the past week. The patient presented to the emergency department with the same pain, which was intermittent and lasting an unspecified number of hours. Pain was not relieved by oxycodone. She vomited twice (green, nonbloody) since last night and had dry heaves this morning. Two episodes of watery diarrhea occurred last week but resolved. The patient decreased her oral intake to primarily bland foods over the past 2 weeks.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of hypertension, obesity, Clostridium difficile colitis, diverticulosis, asthma, and rectal polyps. Previous sigmoid resection for diverticulitis c/b abscess requiring drainage.
medical_history.family_history: Brother with ALS, family history of cancer (maternal grandmother), and several family members with hypertension, coronary artery disease/peripheral vascular disease.
